Text:
Worst choice of sample ever... It's from the start of the movie, and then cuts out when the first frames of the filming begins...
When you start loading 10 gigs of a movie, you'd at least want the reassurance you are not wasting your time/money/etc..
Still, this is most probably the best quality download of this movie title - but you'll have to download the 10 gigs to find out...
